question:
You recently went to a public event (for example an exhibition, festival, or show) that you think your friend would enjoy. Write a letter to a friend.
In your letter:
tell your friend what the event was
explain why you think your friend would like the event
invite them to come to the event with you
text: It has been a long time since we met so let’s plan to catch up soon. I recently attended a book exhibition that I think could be a perfect opportunity for us to meet and spend a good time.
This is an international book exhibition that has books from  authors around the globe and has sections for many different genres.

As you are fascinated by books since childhood, I think you will love this event. They have a huge section specifically for science and fiction enthusiasts like you. On weekends they host a writer’s event where people can interact with well-known writers and every evening they have a play based on various books which are quite fun to attend.

Let me know when you are free next week so we can go together to explore some books just like the old times. After the exhibition, we can go and have dinner at our favourite place followed by the latest Marvel movie.
